head.description: Compress and convert your images to modern formats

input.title: Drop your images here
input.description: or use the buttons below to add files

options.title: Compress
options.description: Reduce the file size without losing quality

options.title: Convert to WebP
options.description: Convert images to the WebP format for better compression

options.title: Convert to AVIF
options.description: Convert images to the AVIF format for better compression

options.title: Same Folder
options.description: Save optimized images in the same folder as the original

options.title: Downloads
options.description: Save optimized images in the downloads folder

options.title: Custom
options.description: Choose a custom folder to save optimized images

options.title: Rename Compressed
options.description: Rename compressed files with a suffix

options.title: Overwrite Original
options.description: Replace original files with compressed versions
